dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2379 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 616 East Main Street in St. Charles, Illinois, as the “Veterans of the Vietnam War Memorial Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 616 East Main Street in St. Charles, Illinois, as the Veterans of the Vietnam War Memorial Post Office.

section.header: Veterans of the Vietnam War Memorial Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 616 East Main Street in St. Charles, Illinois, shall be known and designated as the Veterans of the Vietnam War Memorial Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Veterans of the Vietnam War Memorial Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 2, 2023.
